member.summary: Indicates the object is a ARM Resource.

member.name: T:Artemis.App.Swashbuckle.Attributes.ClientFlattenAttribute
member.summary: Marked class will be flattened in client library by AutoRest to make it more user freindly. Level of flatening is governed by using AutoRest argument. default level is 2.

member.name: P:Artemis.App.Swashbuckle.Attributes.ClientFlattenAttribute.PropertyName
member.summary: Name of the property that will be marked with 'x-ms-client-flatten'.

member.summary: Can be string of format with the following Directives: {GenericType}

member.name: T:Artemis.App.Swashbuckle.Attributes.LongRunningOperationFinalStateVia
member.summary: 长请求类型

member.name: F:Artemis.App.Swashbuckle.Attributes.LongRunningOperationFinalStateVia.AzureAsyncOperation
member.summary: The final response will be available at the uri pointed to by the header Azure-AsyncOperation.

member.name: F:Artemis.App.Swashbuckle.Attributes.LongRunningOperationFinalStateVia.Location
member.summary: The final response will be available at the uri pointed to by the header Location

member.name: F:Artemis.App.Swashbuckle.Attributes.LongRunningOperationFinalStateVia.OriginalUri
member.summary: The final response will be available via GET at the original resource URI

member.name: T:Artemis.App.Swashbuckle.Attributes.LongRunningOperationAttribute
member.summary: Some REST operations can take a long time to complete. Although REST is not supposed to be stateful, some operations are made asynchronous while waiting for the state machine to create the resources, and will reply before the operation on resources are completed. When x-ms-long-running-operation is specified, there should also be a x-ms-long-running-operation-options specified. This attribute should be used when the final state is conveyed using the location header.

member.name: P:Artemis.App.Swashbuckle.Attributes.LongRunningOperationAttribute.FinalStateVia
member.summary: Final state via enum.

member.name: T:Artemis.App.Swashbuckle.Attributes.MutabilityTypes
member.summary: Three possible mutability values of a property.

member.name: F:Artemis.App.Swashbuckle.Attributes.MutabilityTypes.Read
member.summary: Indicates that the value of the property can be read.

member.name: F:Artemis.App.Swashbuckle.Attributes.MutabilityTypes.Create
member.summary: Indicates that the value of the property can be set while creating/initializing/constructing the object.

member.name: F:Artemis.App.Swashbuckle.Attributes.MutabilityTypes.Update
member.summary: Indicates that value of the property can be updated anytime(even after the object is created).

member.name: T:Artemis.App.Swashbuckle.Attributes.MutabilityAttribute
member.summary: Offers insight to Autorest on how to generate code (mutability of the property of the model classes being generated). It doesn't alter the modeling of the actual payload that is sent on the wire. It is an array of strings with three possible values. The array cannot have repeatable values. Valid values are: "create", "read", "update". create: Indicates that the value of the property can be set while creating/initializing/constructing the object read: Indicates that the value of the property can be read update: Indicates that value of the property can be updated anytime(even after the object is created)

member.name: P:Artemis.App.Swashbuckle.Attributes.MutabilityAttribute.Mutability
member.summary: Gets or sets mutablility of a field Eg: [Mutable(Mutability = MutabilityTypes.create | MutabilityTypes.read)].

member.name: T:Artemis.App.Swashbuckle.Attributes.PageableAttribute
member.summary: The REST API guidelines define a common pattern for paging through lists of data. The operation response is modeled in OpenAPI as a list of items (a "page") and a link to the next page, effectively resembling a singly linked list. Tag the operation as x-ms-pageable and the generated code will include methods for navigating between pages.

member.name: P:Artemis.App.Swashbuckle.Attributes.PageableAttribute.ItemName
member.summary: Gets or sets optional (default: value). Specifies the name of the property that provides the collection of pageable items.

member.name: P:Artemis.App.Swashbuckle.Attributes.PageableAttribute.NextLinkName
member.summary: Gets or sets required. Specifies the name of the property that provides the next link (common: nextLink). If the model does not have a next link property then specify null. This is useful for services that return an object that has an array referenced by itemName. The object is then flattened in a way that the array is directly returned, no paging is used. This provides a better client side API to the end user.

member.name: P:Artemis.App.Swashbuckle.Attributes.PageableAttribute.OperationName
member.summary: Gets or sets optional (default: <operationName>Next). Specifies the name of the operation for retrieving the next page.

member.summary: Used to set additional content types to response.

member.param: true to show that the property this attribute is bound to is read-only.

member.summary: Is read only property.

member.name: T:Artemis.App.Swashbuckle.Attributes.SubTypeOfAttribute
member.summary: By convention, if a schema has an 'allOf' that references only one other schema, AutoRest treats this reference as an indication that the allOf schema represents a base type being extended.

member.summary: Applies filter.

member.name: T:Artemis.App.Swashbuckle.Filters.OperationFilters.AddLongRunningOperationExtensionFilter
member.summary: Adds x-ms-long-running-operation extenstion to opertaion marked with . Some REST operations can take a long time to complete. Although REST is not supposed to be stateful, some operations are made asynchronous while waiting for the state machine to create the resources, and will reply before the operation on resources are completed. When x-ms-long-running-operation is specified, there should also be a x-ms-long-running-operation-options specified. x-ms-long-running-operation-options: string - one of azure-async-operation or location or original-uri. Hard coding x-ms-long-running-operation-options value to azure-async-operation.

member.name: T:Artemis.App.Swashbuckle.Filters.OperationFilters.AddPageableExtensionFilter
member.summary: Adds x-ms-pageable extension to operation marked with Pageable attribute.

member.name: M:Artemis.App.Swashbuckle.Filters.OperationFilters.AddPageableExtensionFilter.Apply(Microsoft.OpenApi.Models.OpenApiOperation,Swashbuckle.AspNetCore.SwaggerGen.OperationFilterContext)
member.summary: Applies filter.

member.summary: 添加版本参数

member.name: M:Artemis.App.Swashbuckle.Filters.OperationFilters.AddVersionParameterWithExactValueInQuery.Apply(Microsoft.OpenApi.Models.OpenApiOperation,Swashbuckle.AspNetCore.SwaggerGen.OperationFilterContext)
member.summary: 应用

member.name: T:Artemis.App.Swashbuckle.Filters.OperationFilters.ArrayInQueryParametersFilter
member.summary: The workaround for openapi3/autorest query parameters serialization For query of type array in parameters, client gen with autorest: need to specify style propety = "form" so that it doesn't fail. For swagger 2.0, Items with reference in query parameter is not valid. This is used to directly add Enums schema to items in case of array type queries instead of references. This resolves that issue. See more: https://github.com/Azure/autorest/issues/3373, https://swagger.io/specification/. Usage guidelines: https://msazure.visualstudio.com/One/_wiki/wikis/AGE%20Agri%20Wiki/95022/ArrayInQueryParametersFilter-usage-guidelines.

member.name: T:Artemis.App.Swashbuckle.Filters.OperationFilters.HideParamInDocsFilter
member.summary: A conditional operation filter to hide an API paramater .

member.name: M:Artemis.App.Swashbuckle.Filters.OperationFilters.HideParamInDocsFilter.#ctor(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: T:Artemis.App.Swashbuckle.Filters.OperationFilters.LongRunningOperationFilter
member.summary: Adds x-ms-long-running-operation extenstion to opertaion marked with . Some REST operations can take a long time to complete. Although REST is not supposed to be stateful, some operations are made asynchronous while waiting for the state machine to create the resources, and will reply before the operation on resources are completed. When x-ms-long-running-operation is specified, there should also be a x-ms-long-running-operation-options specified. This attribute should be used when the final state is conveyed using the location header.

member.name: T:Artemis.App.Swashbuckle.Filters.OperationFilters.MoveSummaryToDescriptionFilter
member.summary: Set Description field using the XMLDoc summary if absent and clear summary. By default Swachbuckle uses remarks tag to populate operation description instead of using summary tag.

member.name: M:Artemis.App.Swashbuckle.Filters.OperationFilters.MoveSummaryToDescriptionFilter.Apply(Microsoft.OpenApi.Models.OpenApiOperation,Swashbuckle.AspNetCore.SwaggerGen.OperationFilterContext)
member.summary: Applies filter.

member.name: T:Artemis.App.Swashbuckle.Filters.OperationFilters.ODataParametersSwaggerOperationFilter
member.summary: Add the supported odata parameters for Odata queries endpoints.

member.name: M:Artemis.App.Swashbuckle.Filters.OperationFilters.ODataParametersSwaggerOperationFilter.Apply(Microsoft.OpenApi.Models.OpenApiOperation,Swashbuckle.AspNetCore.SwaggerGen.OperationFilterContext)
member.summary: Apply

member.name: T:Artemis.App.Swashbuckle.Filters.OperationFilters.RemoveDuplicateApiVersionParameterFilter
member.summary:
By default MVC API versioning library adding "api-version" query parameter to each API. And it is getting duplicated when there is an additional model binding with same "api-version" parameter in any API while actually using this parameter.
This operation filter removes the duplicated "api-version" query parameter.

member.name: T:Artemis.App.Swashbuckle.Filters.OperationFilters.ReverseAllOfPropertiesFilter
member.summary: Solve known issues with Swashbuckle 5 For more details: https://github.com/domaindrivendev/Swashbuckle.AspNetCore/issues/1488 , https://github.com/Azure/autorest/issues/3417

member.name: T:Artemis.App.Swashbuckle.Filters.OperationFilters.SetConsumesContentTypeFilter
member.summary: Clear all consumed types except application/json.

member.name: M:Artemis.App.Swashbuckle.Filters.OperationFilters.SetConsumesContentTypeFilter.Apply(Microsoft.OpenApi.Models.OpenApiOperation,Swashbuckle.AspNetCore.SwaggerGen.OperationFilterContext)
member.summary: Applies filter.

member.name: T:Artemis.App.Swashbuckle.Filters.OperationFilters.SetProducesContentTypeFilter
member.summary: Clear all the supported mime type from reponse object. Supported mime type is added at document level, with hardcoded value of application/json.

member.name: T:Artemis.App.Swashbuckle.Filters.SchemaFilters.AddMutabilityExtensionFilter
member.summary: Adds x-ms-mutability to the property marked by Offers insight to Autorest on how to generate code (mutability of the property of the model classes being generated). It doesn't alter the modeling of the actual payload that is sent on the wire. It is an array of strings with three possible values. The array cannot have repeatable values. Valid values are: "create", "read", "update". create: Indicates that the value of the property can be set while creating/initializing/constructing the object read: Indicates that the value of the property can be read update: Indicates that value of the property can be updated anytime(even after the object is created).

member.name: T:Artemis.App.Swashbuckle.Filters.SchemaFilters.SubTypeOfFilter
member.summary: Inheritance in OpenApi spec is represented by including all the properties of base class in representation of derived class. Which leads to repetitions of same fields in all the derived classes representations. To avoid this problem. We have marked inherited classes with . Using which we will load the base class schemas and remove all base class properties from derived class.

member.name: M:Artemis.App.Swashbuckle.Filters.SchemaFilters.SubTypeOfFilter.Apply(Microsoft.OpenApi.Models.OpenApiSchema,Swashbuckle.AspNetCore.SwaggerGen.SchemaFilterContext)
member.summary: Applies filter.
